## ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Do NOT publicly disclose security vulnerabilities

If this is a **critical security vulnerability** that could be exploited:
- **DO NOT** create a public issue
- Instead, please report it privately via [GitHub Security Advisory](https://github.com/kushmanmb-org/.github/security/advisories/new)
- Or contact the security team directly (see SECURITY.md)

For **general security improvements** or **non-critical security concerns**, you may continue with this issue.
